channel.title: CVE Feed for Mattermost -- Mattermost App Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mattermost -- Mattermost App Framework

item.title: CVE-2023-2783|2023-06-16T08:39:26.096Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20app%20framework
item.description: Mattermost Apps Framework fails to verify that a secret provided in the incoming webhook request allowing an attacker toÂ modify the contents of the post sent by the Apps.

item.title: CVE-2023-2784|2023-06-16T08:41:59.270Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20app%20framework
item.description: Mattermost fails to verify if the requestor is a sysadmin or not, before allowing `install` requests to the Apps allowing a regular user send install requests to the Apps.
